sources.title: Arch of Marcus Aurelius
sources.content:
The Arch of Marcus Aurelius may refer to:

Arch of Marcus Aurelius (Rome), in Italy
Arch of Marcus Aurelius (Tripoli), in Libya (ancient city of Oea)
